
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(clickhouse-base-common)
target_compile_options(clickhouse-base-common PUBLIC
  -DOS_LINUX
)
target_compile_options(clickhouse-base-common PRIVATE
  -DBOOST_ASIO_STANDALONE=1
  -DPOCO_ENABLE_CPP11
  -DPOCO_HAVE_FD_EPOLL
  -DPOCO_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
  -DUSE_REPLXX=0
  -DWITH_COVERAGE=0
  -DZ_TLS=__thread
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(clickhouse-base-common PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base
)
target_include_directories(clickhouse-base-common PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/cityhash-1.0.2
)
target_link_libraries(clickhouse-base-common PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  contrib-libs-cctz
  libs-cctz-tzdata
  contrib-libs-fmt
  libs-poco-Foundation
  libs-poco-Net
  libs-poco-Util
  restricted-boost-context
  restricted-boost-dynamic_bitset
  restricted-boost-filesystem
  restricted-boost-geometry
  restricted-boost-multi_index
  restricted-boost-program_options
  restricted-boost-system
  restricted-boost-tti
  contrib-restricted-cityhash-1.0.2
)
target_sources(clickhouse-base-common PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/DateLUT.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/DateLUTImpl.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/JSON.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/LineReader.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/StringRef.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/argsToConfig.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/coverage.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/demangle.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/errnoToString.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/getFQDNOrHostName.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/getMemoryAmount.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/getPageSize.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/getResource.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/getThreadId.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/mremap.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/phdr_cache.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/preciseExp10.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/setTerminalEcho.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/shift10.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/sleep.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/common/terminalColors.cpp
)
